channel.title: Comments on: RETRO: Unwound “Petals Like Brick” live

item.title: By: Allen
item.dc:creator: Allen
item.description: Oh I totally get it... Potently inspirational in every way, from start to finish, EP to LP... The great 'could-have-been' band, that exceeded in every way without closing any where near their fullest potential. An all-time favorite....
item.content:encoded: Oh I totally get it… Potently inspirational in every way, from start to finish, EP to LP… The great ‘could-have-been’ band, that exceeded in every way without closing any where near their fullest potential. An all-time favorite….
